nodes.text: The Neldiz district was an area on the planet Coruscant. It was patrolled by cam droids supplied by Shield Securities. After Lok Durd's sinister damotite bioweapon was unleashed on Chandrila during the Clone Wars via Shield security cameras, the Neldiz, Bonchaka, and F'tu districts, as well as other parts of Coruscant, existed in fear of the bioweapon threat due to their security cams.
